name: The Derby
description: At least three different cocktails bear the name Derby, to commemorate the long bond between drinking and betting on horses.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 ounce Grand Marnier or orange curaçao
Lime wedge or mint leaf, for garnish

recipeInstructions.text: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice. Add bourbon, lime, sweet vermouth, and Grand Marnier and shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with lime wedge or mint leaf.
